channel.title: In*Die RPG Zine
channel.description:
We just released In :game_die:Die Zine, a new tabletop roleplaying zine of high-quality indie content! This first issue features nine incredible and innovative games, four instructive and provocative articles, four useless and system-agnostic supplements, and six moves inspired by hit musicals! It's available both on Itch and DriveThruRPG.
https://indie-zine.itch.io/indie-zine-september-2020
https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/328505/indie-zine--September-2020
(I wrote a solo journaling game about a melancholy giant in a world populated by humans. I think it is very good, but I also think the other things in the zine are well worth your attention and money.)
